mapper.select:
SELECT solution.*
FROM IsuPageSolution solution
WHERE solution.orgId=#{orgId} AND solution.deleted != TRUE AND solution.disabled != TRUE ORDER BY solution.createTime ASC
mapper.insert: insert into IsuPageSolution (name, orgId, defaultVal, buildIn, deleted, disabled, createTime) values (#{name}, #{orgId}, #{defaultVal}, #{buildIn}, FALSE, FALSE, NOW())

update.if: insert into IsuPageSolutionItem (typeId, opt, pageId, solutionId, orgId) values (#{typeId}, #{opt}, #{pageId}, #{solutionId}, #{orgId})

mapper.update:
UPDATE TstProject SET issuePageSolutionId=#{solutionId}, updateTime=NOW()
WHERE id=#{projectId} AND orgId=#{orgId}
